Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=1.6µM),Candida albicans(MIC=25.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=1.6µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MBC=25-50µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MBC=1.6µg/ml)
